top_comments_top.body: Need for Speed Underground 2 was goat.
I might be wrong but I think tony hawk underground was one of the first network playable games?  So that was really exciting at the time.
Well you waited long enough, saves you some money buying them now instead of 20 years ago

Everything except Gran Turismo I bought for GameCube.

I ended up liking True Crime more than any of the GTA games that gen (the GTA games I bought on PC).
THUG was the shit to play when I was younger.
